__TOC__

I have to tell that most of the ideas I have for Xubuntu are motivated by 2 things:

* I have intolerance to brightness and light, so mainly all of the things I imagine are darkish
* I need to generate an Edubuntu Lite distro so old-recycled computers can work with better perfromance.
